text:
Im going to throw this back out here:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Create-a-connector-for-Google-DataStudio/idi-p/33388>

This has alot of votes on it (more than some of the others that are "in planning"). Just curious if anyone at HS is exploring this or not. I know I talked with some devs at Inbound about this as well.
use that twitter / google star clout :slightly_smiling_face:
lol thats what im hoping for and it was kinda a sub reason behind the post
